scripts.switch-event: (jq -c '.homepage = "https://hacktj.org/2020"' package.json > tmp.$$.json && mv tmp.$$.json package.json) && (sed 's|<Router>|<Router basepath="/2020">|' src/App.js | tee src/App.js) && (git remote set-url origin git@github.com:HackTJ/2020.git)
scripts.switch-homepage: (jq -c '.homepage = "https://hacktj.org"' package.json > tmp.$$.json && mv tmp.$$.json package.json) && (sed 's|<Router basepath="/2020">|<Router>|' src/App.js | tee src/App.js) && (git remote set-url origin git@github.com:HackTJ/hacktj.github.io.git)
scripts.deploy-event: npm run switch-event && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy-homepage: npm run switch-homepage && npm run deploy
scripts.deploy-all: npm run deploy-event && npm run deploy-homepage && npm run switch-event
